annotations.description: The Corpse Reviver #2 is an important cocktail not only because it is a very common call drink but also because it's template has been adopted so much for ot...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Corpse Reviver #2

textContent:
.75oz. (20ml) Gin 
.75oz. (20ml) Cointreau
.75oz. (20ml) Cocchi Americano
.75oz. (20ml) Lemon Juice 
Absinthe Rinse
Lemon Twist

Shake and pour into absinthe rinsed glass. 
Garnish with lemon twist. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ky34tHDsbN4
title: Corpse Reviver #2
